title: Process Control Lab
description: Dynamics of chemical processes and their control. Techniques of conventional process control as well as digital control. Laboratory experiments would illustrate these concepts.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHBE 3210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CHBE 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CHBE 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CHBE 4300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CHBE 4320 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CHBE 4411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
